articles.title: 48 new Starlink satellites deployed into orbit by SpaceX - DNA India
articles.description: During a live stream of the launch, SpaceX's launch director said: 'Time to let the American broomstick fly and hear the sounds of freedom.'
articles.content: Elon Musk’s space venture SpaceX has successfully launched 48 new Starlink satellites into orbit. The new batch of satellites was launched on Wednesday aboard a two-stage Falcon 9 rocket, from Cape C… [+1263 chars]

articles.author: Harry Howard
articles.title: McDonald's closes 850 restaurants in Russia 32 years after launch in Moscow - Daily Mail
articles.description: After it opened on January 31, 1990, the McDonald's in Moscow's Pushkin Square quickly became a symbol of the power of American capitalism as the Soviet Union collapsed.
articles.content:
When it first opened its doors in January 1990, 30,000 Russians who had lived under the iron fist of Soviet rule queued patiently to get their first taste of McDonald's Big Mac. 
The fast-food giant… [+7569 chars]

articles.author: Jeanna Smialek, Alan Rappeport
articles.title: How a Ban Russian Oil Imports Could Affect the U.S. Economy - The New York Times
articles.description: The White House is stopping Russian energy imports as the country wages war on Ukraine, which could push American gas prices even higher.
articles.content: But consumers are sitting on big cash piles amassed over the course of the pandemic, and because the United States produces gas domestically, higher prices could also incentivize companies to invest … [+1290 chars]
